brainly_data.question:
Please help :)
Linnaeus created a three-kingdom classification system. More kingdoms were later added to this classification. What does this highlight about scientific knowledge?

Scientific knowledge can be revised with time. 
Scientific knowledge about living things is incorrect. 
Scientific knowledge can be used for personal gain. 
Scientific knowledge is based on the opinion of scientists
brainly_data.subject: Biology
